content.rendered:
Advance your career with a degree from the University of La Verne.

The University of La Verne is a nonprofit, private university committed to supporting our students as they pursue their passions, grow personally, and prepare for a lifetime of success.

Whether you’re looking for the classic university experience on the La Verne Campus or pursuing an accelerated degree at one of our campuses in Central or Southern California and online, all students receive the high-quality education and personalized academic support that sets a University of La Verne education apart.
